Html.content: If the list formatter can include settings from display formatters, we have to specify at the display formatters configuration which settings should be shown at the list and how. To do so, we have to set the "Visibility" of the element setting. In our case we use "parentShared", meaning that the setting never appears if the display formatter is used for an element directly dropped to the page, and that in the list, the option appears directly with the options of the list.
